Megatron X stood and wieghed his options.=A0 It sounded like Kup had corner=
ed Rodimus for him.=A0 But one was no good, he was out to get both him and =
his wife, Nightlight.=A0 But then again, the first attempt failed and he ha=
d already relligated his time to other things.=A0 Well, best to ask a few m=
ore questions.
=A0
"Where is Rodimus Prime and what is his condition?=A0 Wi=
ll I really be needed to fight or simply observe?" he inquired over the com=
m channel.

ote:

> "Grimlock is confused" said the t-rex robot.

Legacy consulted his =
record of events and examined what he knew of this Megatron X. Information =
was spotty at best due to the sparseness of records of this time period. Ho=
wever what he did find did not ease his mind. 

Legacy transformed from his=
 tank mode into robot as he approached Grimlock. For a moment he studied th=
e T-rex his head tilting. Then he spoke, his voice as ever deep and powerfu=
l, "WHAT DO YOU KNOW OF THIS MEGATRON X?" 

(TAG Grimlock)

Preston

Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Megatron X stood and wieghed his options.  It sounded like Kup had cornered Rodimus for him.  But one was no good, he was out to get both him and his wife, Nightlight.  But then again, the first attempt failed and he had already relligated his time to other things.  Well, best to ask a few more questions.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>"Where is Rodimus Prime and what is his condition?  Will I really be needed to fight or simply observe?" he inquired over the comm channel.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Tue, 9/9/08, Super Cyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...><BR>Subject: Re: A Spark of Hope<BR>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Tuesday, September 9, 2008, 4:05 PM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv106702075>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>> Kup Looked aroundtrying to find out what to do next, when he picked up <BR>> a familiar signature... YES !! He remebered it, it was the "Clone" of <BR>> Hydras, Megatron x; his brother and he were in Maximal's ranks long <BR>> time ago.<BR>> <BR>> "Megatron... do you copy?"said Kup by Comlink "It's Kup!!!" <BR>> <BR>> "Grimlock is confused" said the t-rex robot.<BR><BR>Legacy consulted his record of events and examined what he knew of this Megatron X. Information was spotty at best due to the sparseness of records of this time period. However what he did find did not ease his mind. <BR><BR>Legacy transformed from his tank mode into robot as he approached Grimlock. For a moment he studied the T-rex his head tilting. Then he spoke, his voice as ever deep and powerful, "WHAT DO YOU KNOW OF THIS MEGATRON X?" <BR><BR>(TAG Grimlock)<BR><BR>Preston<BR><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
